I like the:
-Fast paced combat
-Sense of progress
-Variety of charaters 
-Skill needed
-Beautiful Graphics
-It does what Dota 1 was great at

I do not like the:
-Competition at times
-longer type matches (which are okay for this type of game, just not my type)

I love this game so coming up with things I don't like is kind of hard. That is what you get and I am sticking with it.
